Job Title: Vice President, Head of Sales Excellence

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Reporting directly to the EVP Sales, the Vice President Sales Excellence is responsible for the leadership of Sales Excellence (SE) program in our Americas Region working in close collaboration with the company’s global Sales Excellence Network.
The Sales Excellence Network will define and deliver a set of locally relevant and globally excellent initiatives, which, taken together, will form what we are calling the Imperial Way of Sales Excellence. 
While every market has important, distinctive local differences, there are similar, core areas where leveraging a global excellence approach will accelerate progress. These core areas include: Retail Excellence, Key Account Excellence, Value Creation, and a Performance Based Culture. 
The Vice President, Sales Excellence shares responsibility for running the global Sales Excellence Network with input from other regional resources across Sales and corporate functions (e.g. Marketing, People and Culture, Insights and Intelligence) and external SME partners. 
As Vice President, Sales Excellence, you will develop and deploy a multi-year sales excellence strategy across the region in alignment with commercial strategy. This includes leading, developing, and implementing best practices, ensuring they are locally relevant, globally excellent. You will design and deliver approaches, toolkits, and templates to enhance sales capabilities, developing a shared sales culture, enhancing sales competencies, and rolling out advanced tools and technology. 
This role involves close collaboration with other regional SE leads within the network, ensuring a unified and effective approach to sales excellence.
You will be an agent of change, leading the transition to new ways of working within the Sales Excellence workstreams.
As part of the Sales Leadership team, you will partner and contribute to the company’s sustainable, commercial success.

region.and guide the development of best practice, approaches, toolkits, templates, etc. in priority areas to drive the execution of sales excellence in the markets.expertise to evaluations, pilots and implementations of leading-edge sales excellence tools such as Consumer Goods Cloud, Artificial Intelligence and data analytics to ensure continuous improvement.with internal experts within the Market Sales teams, and from other functions (e.g. Insights, M&PM, Revenue Growth Management, etc.) to source, input and create materials as required.with external experts to incorporate
